name: Chess Defense (chinkeeyong)
description:
The kingdom of Chesstopia is under attack! Equipped with a set of 16 standard chess pieces, survive as long as possible against waves of enemy pawns, knights, bishops, rooks, and queens.

Made for NTU ADM Game Design II.

Source on GitHub

Credits

Art, design, and programming by Chin Kee Yong
Music: Something About Us by Daft Punk (8-Bit Remix by Sound-O-Vision)
With sounds by EdgardEdition, rodincoil, cabled_mess, DWOBoyle
Title artwork adapted from Wikimedia Commons
